sentences.en: But the likelihood is that people would be willing to pay if they were certain that their money was going to a good cause.
sentences.cn: 但如果人们确切知道自己的钱会用于做善事，他们就可能更愿意掏腰包。

sentences.en: Do you think there is any likelihood of his agreeing to it?
sentences.cn: 你认为他有同意此事的可能性 吗 ?

sentences.en: I don't think there is any likelihood of his agreeing to it.
sentences.cn: 我认为不会有他同意那件事情的可能.

sentences.en: If I refused, it would in all likelihood mean I’d lose my job.
sentences.cn: 如果我拒绝，那我十有八九会丢掉工作。

sentences.en: Probability is a numerical statement of the likelihood that an event will occur.
sentences.cn: 概率是指某一事件发生可能性的数量陈述.

sentences.en: That, as we all know, is not only a possibility but a likelihood.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，那不仅可能发生，而且是很可能发生。

sentences.en: The likelihood is that the slump will be followed by a period of buoyancy.
sentences.cn: 萧条过后经济有可能会出现一段时期的繁荣。

sentences.en: The likelihood is, you'll need to raise more elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 很可能你还得从其他方面再筹一些.

sentences.en: The likelihood of infection is minimal.
The most important deterrent for most criminals is the likelihood of detection and arrest.
sentences.cn: 对大多数罪犯来说，最大的威慑力量是警方可能会破案并将他们逮捕。

sentences.en: There didn't seem much likelihood of it happening.
sentences.cn: 这种事情发生的可能性不大。

sentences.en: There is a strong likelihood that the matter will soon be settled.
sentences.cn: 事情极可能不久就会获得解决.

sentences.en: There is every likelihood that sanctions will work.
sentences.cn: 制裁完全可能发挥作用。

sentences.en: There is every likelihood that she'll come.
There is no likelihood of his coming again.
Using a seatbelt will reduce the likelihood of serious injury in a car accident.
sentences.cn: 系安全带可以降低在车祸中受重伤的可能性。

sentences.en: We must try our best to reduce the likelihood of war.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽最大努力减少战争的可能性.

words.tran_cn: 令人喜爱的，可爱的（等于likable）
很可能的；合适的；有希望的

phrases.tran_cn: 最大似然估计；最大相似估计法
最大似然估计值；极大似然估计量；最大概似推定量

trans.tran_cn: 可能，可能性，[数]似然，似真
trans.tran_en: the degree to which something can reasonably be expected to happen
